improvement_list.improvement_desc: Potential division by zero error. Add a check to ensure y is not zero before performing the division.
The variable 'y' might be zero, leading to division by zero. Add a check to handle this case, such as using a conditional statement to avoid the division when 'y' is zero.
Unreachable code. The loop always executes, so this block will never be reached.
Redundant code. This block is identical to the one above, so consider merging to improve clarity and efficiency.  Perhaps a simple conditional assignment would suffice.
Redundant code.  The print statement will execute regardless of the if/else. Consider moving it outside the loop.
Redundant code.  These print statements are at the end of the execution and have no effect on the program's logic.  Remove them to improve efficiency.
